english: four seasons; all year round; throughout the year; year-round

etymology.description: 四 (four) + 季 (season) = four seasons; by extension year-round
etymology.interpretation: Literally “four seasons,” referring to spring, summer, autumn, and winter; by extension means throughout the year or all year round.

examples.chinese: 北京四季分明(北京四季分明)。
这家店四季营业(這家店四季營業)。
我们四季供应新鲜水果(我們四季供應新鮮水果)。
examples.english: We supply fresh fruit throughout the year.
